sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"充分的，丰富的"之意。
means: abundant ：着重某物极为丰富有或大量的供应。
plentiful ：普通用词，指某物的数量多得称心如意，不过剩，但较少用于描写抽象之物。
ample ：指某物不仅满足了需要而且有余。

sentence.Network_en: Birds are abundant in the tall vegetation.
sentence.Network_cn: 高大的植被中有着大量的鸟类。

sentence.Network_en: Fish are abundant in the lake.
Mosquitoes are extremely abundant in this dark wet place.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个阴暗潮湿的地方蚊子非常多.

list.abs: 《数学专业英语词汇》 - 豆丁网 ... absurdity 谬论 abundance ratio 丰度比 abundant number 过剩数.
coseparation 同时分离cosmic abundance 宇宙丰度cosmic background radiation 宇宙背景辐射
这项由施密特负责的研究还显示，各个国家的滥交程度随男人“相对丰度(relative abundance)”的变化而变化。在中国、日本和韩国等东亚国家，男人数量多于女人数量，而不承担责任的临时性行为水平相对.
isotope-isomerization 同位素异构作用isotopic abundance 同位素分丰度; 同位素丰度; 同位素丰富度-

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Latin abundant- 'abounding', from the verb abundare (see abound)

entry.def: Something that is abundant is present in large quantities.

example.ex: There is an abundant supply of cheap labour...
Birds are abundant in the tall vegetation.
example.tran: 高大的植被中有着大量的鸟类。

auth_sentence.content: There's also abundant outrage, and justifiably so.
auth_sentence.res_content: There's also abundant outrage, and justifiably so.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There's also abundant outrage, and justifiably so.

auth_sentence.content: We had become used to abundant and cheap food.
auth_sentence.res_content: We had become used to abundant and cheap food.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We had become used to abundant and cheap food.

auth_sentence.content: Mrs Jackson was not blessed with abundant good looks.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mrs Jackson was not blessed with abundant good looks.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mrs Jackson was not blessed with abundant good looks.

Sentence.sentence: In America, white tailed deer are more numerous than ever before, so abundant in fact that they've become a suburban nuisance and a health hazard.

sentences.en: Rainfall is abundant in the region.
China is abundant with natural resources.

jushi.english: The country has abundant supplies of oil and gas.
jushi.chinese: 这个国家的石油和天然气供应非常充足。

jushi.english: We took an abundant supply of food with us when we went hiking in the mountains.
jushi.chinese: 我们远足登山的时候带了充足的食物。

jushi.english: There's abundant evidence for pressing charges.
jushi.chinese: 有大量的证据佐助起诉。
